browse.where: PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.ClientCompany = '$S{ClientCompany}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.P_PositioningRelation= '$C{PositioningRelation.Positioning}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.P_IsCompetitorCompany='N' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.P_EntityType='$C{PositioningEntityType.Product}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.P_Status='$C{PositioningStatus.Enabled}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.PC_PositioningRelation= '$C{PositioningRelation.Positioning}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.PC_IsCompetitorCompany='Y' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.PC_EntityType='$C{PositioningEntityType.Product}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.PC_Status='$C{PositioningStatus.Enabled}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.CM_PositioningRelation= '$C{PositioningRelation.CompetitiveMessaging}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.CM_IsCompetitorCompany='Y' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.CM_EntityType='$C{PositioningEntityType.Product}' and PositioningAllByProductByIndustryReportView.CM_Status='$C{PositioningStatus.Enabled}'
